hooks.command: bash -c 'DATA=$(cat); TOOL_NAME=$(echo "$DATA" | jq -r ".tool // .tool_name // \"Tool\""); STATUS=$(echo "$DATA" | jq -r ".status // \"completed\""); if command -v notify-send >/dev/null 2>&1; then notify-send -u normal -i terminal "Claude Code" "$TOOL_NAME $STATUS"; elif command -v powershell.exe >/dev/null 2>&1; then powershell.exe -Command "New-BurntToastNotification -Text '"'"'Claude Code'"'"', '"'"'$TOOL_NAME $STATUS'"'"'"; fi'

bash -c 'if command -v notify-send >/dev/null 2>&1; then notify-send -u normal -i terminal "Claude Code" "Compacting conversation history"; elif command -v powershell.exe >/dev/null 2>&1; then powershell.exe -Command "New-BurntToastNotification -Text '"'"'Claude Code'"'"', '"'"'Compacting conversation history'"'"'"; fi'
bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE"; fi'
bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.sh$ ]]; then shfmt -bn -ci -kp -w "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path); if [[ "$FILE" == *"flake.nix" ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *"home.nix" ]]; then nix flake check 2>&1 | head -20; fi'
bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.nix$ ]]; then nixfmt "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || nixpkgs-fmt "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
bash -c 'FILE=$(jq -r .tool_input.file_path); if [[ "$FILE" =~ \.nix$ ]]; then alejandra "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'

bash -c 'CMD=$(jq -r .tool_input.command); BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [[ "$CMD" =~ "git commit" ]] && [[ "$BRANCH" =~ ^(main|master)$ ]]; then echo "Direct commits to main/master branch are not allowed"; exit 2; fi'

bash -c 'CMD=$(jq -r .tool_input.command); if [[ "$CMD" =~ "git push.*--force" ]] && ! [[ "$CMD" =~ "--force-with-lease" ]]; then echo "Use --force-with-lease instead of --force for safer force pushes"; exit 2; fi'
bash -c 'CMD=$(jq -r .tool_input.command); if [[ "$CMD" =~ "rm -rf" ]] && [[ "$CMD" =~ (/|~|\$HOME) ]]; then echo "Dangerous rm -rf detected on critical paths"; exit 2; fi'

bash -c 'DATA=$(cat); AGENT=$(echo "$DATA" | jq -r .tool_input.subagent_type); PROMPT=$(echo "$DATA" | jq -r ".tool_input.prompt // \"No prompt\"" | head -c 60); echo "[$(date "+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")] AGENT    | $AGENT | $PROMPT..." >> ~/.claude/delegation-log.txt'
